ingredients: 1  sugar cube, 1 teaspoon water, 1 dash bitters, 2 fluid ounces whiskey (rye or bourbon), 1  lemon twist,   +   1/2 cup ice cubes, or as needed, 1  orange slice, for garnish, 1  maraschino cherry, for garnish
nutrition: Sodium 7mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 7g 3%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 4g, Calcium 8mg 1%, Potassium 12mg 0%
